questions.question: The purpose of using Fill tool is

answers.a: To fill the large sized voids in the raster
answers.b: To remove small imperfections in the raster
answers.c: To fill the medium sized voids in the raster
answers.d: To carryon radiometric correction to the raster

answers.a: Maximum rate of change in pixel value from each pixel to its neighbours
answers.b: Rate of change of elevation for each pixel
answers.c: Minimum rate of change in pixel value from each pixel to its neighbours
